meanings.definition: People who admire or worship idols.
meanings.sent1: The idolizers gathered around the statue, gazing in awe.
meanings.sent2: The idolizers in the temple lit incense and offered prayers to the golden idol.
meanings.sent3: The idolizers cheered loudly as they watched their favorite singer perform on stage.
meanings.sent4: She was an idolizer of classic literature, always quoting Shakespeare and Austen.
meanings.sent5: The idolizers' faces lit up with joy as they received autographs from the famous actor.

meanings.definition: Those who show excessive admiration or devotion to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The idolizers couldn't stop talking about how amazing their favorite band was.
meanings.sent2: She became an idolizer of fashion, always following the latest trends.
meanings.sent3: The idolizers showered their beloved leader with gifts and praise.
meanings.sent4: He was an idolizer of fast cars, collecting every model he could afford.
meanings.sent5: The idolizers' dedication to their sports team was unmatched, painting their faces in team colors.
